themes: importance of outreach to diverse communities
key_phrases: it feels like there is a barrier to entry
you have to know where to look for these opportunities
some require a business or track record
trying to make ends meet financially
mentorships, informational events, and outreach...would be helpful
barriers_identified: requirements for business or track record
lack of knowledge on proposal building
difficulty following through with ambitious projects
solutions_proposed: outreach to a wide variety of communities
